pr_title: Flink: Add Avro value reader, writer implementations

timeline.message: Flink: Add Avro value reader, writer implementations

timeline.bodyText: To make sure the projection is done correctly in the record reader, can you add a projection test? Here's the one we use for Iceberg generics and Avro: https://github.com/apache/iceberg/blob/master/data/src/test/java/org/apache/iceberg/data/avro/TestGenericReadProjection.java
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: The implementation looks fine since it relies on the parent class, but this would help catch regressions in the future.
replies.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: Thanks for reminding,  will address this in the next patch.
replies.author: openinx

replies.bodyText: @rdblue I've addressed this by porting the unit test in TestGenericReadProjection to flink avro reader writer. Thanks.
replies.author: openinx

timeline.bodyText: How many records have you tested with?
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: I ran 1_000_000 rows under my host, it all passed.  Seems works fine.
replies.author: openinx

timeline.bodyText: Should setWriter be used in setSchema above for this class as well?
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: Fine,  let address it in the next patch. Thanks.
replies.author: openinx

replies.bodyText: The setWriter can be removed now in the new patch because we don't need to expose it in new way.
replies.author: openinx

timeline.bodyText: Can we remove the constructor since it is empty?
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: The current FlinkAvroWriter#WriterBuilder is extending the DataWriter#WriteBuilder , so I marked this constructor as protected before, seems I could also abstract the generic codes in a BaseDataWriter so that we don't need to expose the WriterBuilder to its subclass then. (similar with the 41cc133).  let me address this in the next patch.
replies.author: openinx

timeline.message: Make the ReaderBuilder & WriterBuilder private access and provid the avro project unit tests.

timeline.bodyText: Looks good. We may want to also apply these cases to ORC and Parquet also.
timeline.author: rdblue
